docs.snippet: ROME, May 2 (AP)--Lew Hoad of Australia and Budge Patty of Los Angeles and Paris won second-round matches today in the Rome international tennis tournament.
docs.lead_paragraph: ROME, May 2 (AP)--Lew Hoad of Australia and Budge Patty of Los Angeles and Paris won second-round matches today in the Rome international tennis tournament.

headline.main: HOAD, PATTY TAKE MATCHES IN ROME; Australian Tennis Star Beats Willey--American Routs De Ebner, 6-0, 6-1, 6-0 Van Voorhees Beaten Perry Duo Triumphs

docs.snippet: El Pueble dir Diaz, 4 aides held for illegal acts; Diaz, as La Escoba dir, got 2-yr jail term in '54 on similar charges; both papers backed Argentine exPres Peron
docs.abstract: El Pueble dir Diaz, 4 aides held for illegal acts; Diaz, as La Escoba dir, got 2-yr jail term in '54 on similar charges; both papers backed Argentine exPres Peron

headline.main: PUBLISHER REARRESTED; Uruguayan Backer of Peron and Four Aides Accused

docs.snippet: Top prizes of the Fifth International Philatelic Exhibition (FIPEX) were announced last night at a dinner at the Hotel Plaza.
docs.lead_paragraph: Top prizes of the Fifth International Philatelic Exhibition (FIPEX) were announced last night at a dinner at the Hotel Plaza.
docs.abstract: R Hoffman (Uruguay) wins Grand Trophy for best exhibit, G F G Ferrini (Italy), best 19th Century collection, Mrs E B McCoy (NYC), best US collection (Summerfield trophy), Mrs P Cromwell (NYC), best gen collection; other awards

headline.main: 2 WOMEN SHARE IN STAMP PRIZES; New Yorkers Are Among the Winners of 4 Top Awards-- Show Ends Tomorrow Wins Summerfield Trophy

docs.snippet: SAN JOSE, Costa Rica, May 4 --The Inter-American Port Harbor Conference, which ended its sessions here Thursday, took two important steps that should benefit shipping in the Hemisphere.
docs.lead_paragraph: SAN JOSE, Costa Rica, May 4 --The Inter-American Port Harbor Conference, which ended its sessions here Thursday, took two important steps that should benefit shipping in the Hemisphere.
docs.abstract: Inter-Amer Port Harbor Conf forms permanent com to insure implementation of port improvement resolutions; adopts Declaration of San Jose requiring equal treatment for all members ships, pub of port laws, permanent labor pools; US delegate Nolan comment

headline.main: LATIN PORT TALKS BRING MAJOR GAIN; Technical Committee Set Up --'Declaration of San Jose' Provides for Labor Pool

byline.original: Special to The New York Times

docs.snippet: American manufacturers who are expanding their overseas operations are focusing keeper interest on foreign "profits sanctuaries," a trade group was told yesterday.
docs.lead_paragraph: American manufacturers who are expanding their overseas operations are focusing keeper interest on foreign "profits sanctuaries," a trade group was told yesterday.
docs.abstract: J Cardinale blames high taxes on foreign investment income for growing interest in foreign 'profit havens'; lists them

headline.main: U.S. CONCERNS EYE 'PROFITS HAVENS'; Keener Interest Is Focused on Foreign 'Sanctuaries,' Trade Group Told Here Panama Is Cited
